TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControl Inherits WebControl
public ref class BaseDataBoundControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl

summary.span: 作為控制項的基底類別，這些控制項是使用 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項繫結至資料。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that bind to data using an ASP.NET data source control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援的控制項架構，可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料一致的方式。ASP.NET supports a controls architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 資料繫結控制項，以及協助繫結稱為資料來源控制項的類別會參照 web 伺服器控制項的繫結至資料。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 設計成使用 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項的資料繫結控制項衍生自控制項類別，定義的基底的資料繫結控制項的功能。Data-bound controls that are designed to use ASP.NET data source controls derive from the control class, which defines the base data-bound control functionality. 您可以使用所提供的資料繫結控制項使用 ASP.NET，包括， ，和，才能執行大部分的網頁開發工作牽涉到顯示資料。You can use the data-bound controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks that involve displaying data. 在案例中，這些控制項不提供您所需要的功能，您可以繼承自基底和類別以實作您自己自訂的資料來源控制項。In scenarios in which these controls do not provide the functionality you need, you can inherit from the base and classes to implement your own custom data source control. 雖然支援的任何類別`DataSource`和`DataSourceID`屬性和`DataBind`方法是在資料繫結控制項，因此大部分的 ASP.NET 資料繫結控制項擴充抽象和類別。While any class that supports the `DataSource` and `DataSourceID` properties and the `DataBind` method is a data-bound control, most ASP.NET data-bound controls extend the abstract and classes. 值得注意的例外狀況包含， ，而控制項。Notable exceptions include , , and the controls. 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是抽象的您無法建立直接物件。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 這個建構函式來初始化中定義的屬性在衍生類別的建構函式通常稱為類別。This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

summary.span: 設定資料繫結控制項之初始化的狀態。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定資料繫結控制項的初始化的狀態。The method sets the initialized state of the data-bound control. 方法會呼叫類別於其方法。The method is called by the class in its method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void DataBind ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub DataBind ()
public: override void DataBind();

summary.span: 將資料來源繫結至所叫用的伺服器控制項及其所有子控制項。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別覆寫來識別資料來源繫結至資料繫結控制項，並建置適當的控制項樹狀結構的方法。The class overrides the method to identify the data source that the data-bound control binds to and builds the appropriate control trees. 資料來源的資料來源時，已由屬性會優先。When resolving the data source, the data source identified by the property takes precedence. 如果未設定時，所識別的物件屬性使用。If is not set, the object identified by the property is used. `DataBind`方法密封格式，衍生自所有 ASP.NET 資料繫結控制項上。The `DataBind` method is sealed on all ASP.NET data-bound controls derived from . 資料繫結控制項衍生自和類別應該覆寫`PerformDataBinding`方法，而非將資料繫結的方法。Data-bound controls derived from the and classes should override the `PerformDataBinding` method instead of the method to bind data. 如果遭到覆寫，和不按順序引發事件。If is overridden, the and events are raised out of order.

.event class System.EventHandler DataBound
Public Custom Event DataBound As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ DataBound;

summary.span: 在伺服器控制項繫結至資料來源之後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the server control binds to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會通知為其撰寫的任何資料繫結邏輯已完成的伺服器控制項。This event notifies the server control that any data binding logic written for it has completed. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 取得或設定資料繫結控制項從中擷取其資料項目清單的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the object from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

value.span: 物件，表示資料繫結控制項從中擷取其資料的資料來源。

span.span: An object that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將屬性，方法呼叫。When you set the property, the method is called. 此外，如果已初始化資料繫結控制項，方法呼叫以設定屬性`true`。In addition, if the data-bound control has already been initialized, the method is called to set the property to `true`. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用資料繫結控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how the property of a data-bound control is used. 在此範例中，控制項繫結至物件。In this example, the control is bound to a object. 之後設定屬性，則會明確地呼叫方法。After the property is set, the method is called explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDataBind/CS/gridviewdatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDataBind/VB/gridviewdatabindvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的識別碼，資料繫結控制項會由此擷取其項目清單。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

value.span: 代表資料來源的控制項別碼，資料繫結控制項會由此擷取其資料。

span.span: The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已經初始化資料繫結控制項 (方法呼叫或處理事件) 當您將屬性，呼叫方法時，將屬性`true`.If the data-bound control has already been initialized (the method is called or event is handled) when you set the property, the method is called, which sets the property to `true`. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用資料繫結控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how the property of a data-bound control is used. 控制項與其相關聯控制項設定其"AuthorsSqlDataSource"，ID 屬性控制項。The control is associated to the control by setting its property to "AuthorsSqlDataSource", the ID of the control. 當屬性設定 (而不是屬性)，資料繫結控制項自動將繫結至資料來源控制項在執行階段。When the property is set (instead of the property), the data-bound control automatically binds to the data source control at run time. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSimple/CS/displaycustomers.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSimple/VB/displaycustomers.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 如果設定了 屬性且資料繫結控制項標記為需要繫結，則會呼叫 方法。

span.span: Calls the method if the property is set and the data-bound control is marked to require binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間會呼叫方法要呼叫的方法方法，如果資料繫結控制項尚未繫結。The method is called during the method, to call the method if the data-bound control is not yet bound. 這是相同的行為模式(從哪些類別，例如衍生) 和類別遵循。This is the same behavior pattern that the (from which classes such as are derived) and classes follow. `EnsureDataBound`也可能會在呼叫期間呼叫方法`CreateChildControls`和`LoadPostData`方法。The `EnsureDataBound` method might also be called during calls to `CreateChildControls` and `LoadPostData` methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法都會明確地設定屬性`true`。The and methods both explicitly set the property to `true`. 方法透過呼叫方法，而時，會呼叫就會引發事件。The method is called by the method, while is called when the event is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範衍生的資料繫結控制項類別所屬的屬性。The following code example shows a property that belongs to a derived data-bound control class. 此範例示範如何在資料繫結控制項可以呼叫方法如果在初始化資料繫結控制項之後，變更此屬性會識別資料來源。The example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，控制， ， ，和使用屬性來判斷是否將資料繫結控制項繫結至 ASP.NET 2.0 資料來源控制項，例如或.Controls such as , , , and use the property to determine whether the data-bound control is bound to an ASP.NET 2.0 data source control, such as an or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何屬性供衍生的資料繫結控制項類別。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used by a derived data-bound control class. 屬性用於方法實作，以判斷是否應該引發事件。The property is used in the method implementation to determine whether the event should be raised. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會通知伺服器控制項與控制項關聯的任何資料繫結邏輯已完成。This method notifies a server control that any data binding logic associated with the control has completed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法密封格式，衍生自的所有控制項。The method is sealed on all controls derived from . 資料繫結控制項應該覆寫`PerformDataBinding`而不是將資料繫結的方法。Data-bound controls should override `PerformDataBinding` instead of the method to bind data. 如果遭到覆寫，和不按順序引發事件。If is overridden, the and events are raised out of order. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法用來引發所衍生的資料繫結控制項類別的事件。The following code example demonstrates how the method is used to raise the event by a derived data-bound control class. 在使用後和方法將資料繫結至控制項，資料繫結控制項引發來表示資料繫結的事件已完成。After using the and methods to bind data to the control, the data-bound control raises the event to signal that data binding is complete. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫， ，或`DataMember`屬性值變更頁面之後隨時已發生事件。The method is called when the , , or `DataMember` property value changes any time after the page's event has occurred. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範衍生的資料繫結控制項類別所屬的屬性。The following code example shows a property that belongs to a derived data-bound control class. 此範例示範如何在資料繫結控制項可以呼叫方法如果在初始化資料繫結控制項之後，變更此屬性會識別資料來源。The example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先呼叫基底類別方法，然後呼叫方法以處理事件。The method first calls the base class method, and then calls the method to handle the event. 此外，如果 HTTP 要求此分頁為回傳且已啟用檢視狀態，方法會設定屬性`true`。Additionally, if the HTTP request to the page is a post back and view state is enabled, the method sets the property to `true`.

summary.span: 設定資料繫結控制項在載入控制項之前的初始化狀態。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件處理常式用來控制資料繫結在頁面的生命週期內發生的時間。The event handler is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page. 它會藉由設定資料繫結控制項的內部初始化的狀態。It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control. 因為控制項的初始化狀態期間設定網頁的生命週期的階段呼叫控制項的資料屬性變更時，該階段之後，以表示控制項必須重新繫結至其資料的任何時間的事件處理常式之前呈現。Because the control's initialized state is set during the phase of the page's lifecycle, the event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);

summary.span: 處理 事件。

span.span: Handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別覆寫事件處理常式呼叫然後再呼叫基底類別方法。The class overrides the event handler to call before calling the base class method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract void PerformSelect ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformSelect() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub PerformSelect ()
protected: abstract void PerformSelect();

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，控制如何擷取資料以及如何將資料繫結至控制項。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, controls how data is retrieved and bound to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的類型覆寫這個方法，以從資料來源擷取資料。Derived types override this method to retrieve data from a data source.

MemberSignature.Value: protected bool RequiresDataBinding { get; set; }
.property instance bool RequiresDataBinding
Protected Property RequiresDataBinding As Boolean
protected: property bool RequiresDataBinding { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the method should be called.

value.span: 傳回的值是如果資料繫結控制項的呈現控制項之前，應該呼叫方法; 否則值是。

span.span: The returned value is if the data-bound control's method should be called before the control is rendered; otherwise, the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定屬性`true`當資料繫結控制項已開始來呈現其輸出至頁面、 目前的 HTTP 要求不是回呼，而且您使用來識別資料來源控制項的屬性繫結到方法則會立即呼叫。If you set the property to `true` when the data-bound control has already begun to render its output to the page, the current HTTP request is not a callback, and you are using the property to identify the data source control to bind to, the method is called immediately. 在此情況下，屬性不實際設`true`。In this case, the property is not actually set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何屬性供衍生的資料繫結控制項類別。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used by a derived data-bound control class. 所擷取的資料之後方法，並繫結至控制項方法，屬性設定為`false`和方法為呼叫來表示控制項已完成繫結，而不再在目前網頁的生命週期期間，需要這個屬性。After data is retrieved by the method and bound to the control with the method, the property is set to `false` and the method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires this property during the current page's lifecycle. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsDisabledAttribute
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0，否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

Protected MustOverride Sub ValidateDataSource (dataSource As Object)
protected: abstract void ValidateDataSource(System::Object ^ dataSource);

param.name: dataSource

span.span: The object to verify.

param.span: 通常是 、、 或 的執行個體。

span.span: Typically an instance of , , , or .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，驗證資料繫結控制項繫結的物件是它可以使用的物件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

para.span: 方法只會呼叫類別的 mutator (setter) 的屬性。

span.span: The method is only called in the class's mutator (setter) for the property.

para.span: 在衍生的類別實作方法，以檢查已設定的物件類型屬性，以確保可以使用資料繫結控制項型別。

span.span: Derived classes implement the method to check the type of the object that is set for the property, to ensure that the data-bound control can work with the type.

para.span: 如果無法辨識型別，衍生型別實作擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If the type is not recognized, derived type implementations throw an exception.
